data.text: Dimaadua e helekai, “Damascus ga hagalee, gaa hai hua di hagabae geinga.
Nia waahale o Syria ga ono daangada ai gaa hana hua beelaa, gaa hai nia gowaa miami siibi mono kau, deai tangada e hagabagi digaula gi daha ai.

Israel ga deemee di duuli ia, gei Damascus ga deemee di duu modogoia. Digau Syria ala ga mouli gaa hai digau haga langaadia gadoo be Israel. Ko Au go Dimaadua di Gowaa Aamua ne helekai.”17.3 Jeremiah 49.23-27; Amos 1.3-5; Zechariah 9.1
Dimaadua e helekai, “Di laangi e dau mai, gei di aamua of Israel ga hagaodi, dono maluagina gaa hai di hagaloale.
Israel gaa hai gadoo be di gowaa ma gaa tuu ono laagau gaa hagi ono huwa, gaa hai di anggowaa be di gowaa mehanga gonduu i Rephaim dela ne hagi ono huwa hogoohi loo.

Digau hogoohi ga mouli, gei Israel gaa hai be di laagau olib dela ma gaa hagi ono huwa huogodoo, ga hagadubu nia golee e lua be e dolu i tahuhu, be hunu huwa dulii ala e daudau i hongo nia manga mugi lala. Ko Au go Yihowah, go di God o Israel ne helekai.”
Di laangi deelaa ma ga dau mai, nia daangada gaa huli gi God Dabuaahia o Israel, dela ne hai nia mee huogodoo, bolo gi hagamaamaa ina ginaadou.

Digaula gu hagalee gana gi nia gowaa hai tigidaumaha ala ne bida hai gi nadau lima, be e hagadonu di nadau mee dela ne hai gi nadau lima: ala go nia ada god ahina Asherah mo nia gowaa dudu tigidaumaha lolo kala.
Di laangi deelaa ma ga dau mai, gei nia waahale maaloo gaa hai nia angaa guongo, ga diiagi gi mooho be nia waahale ala ne diiagi go digau Hivite mo digau Amor i nadau llele hagammuni i digau Israel.
Israel, goe gu de langahia e goe di God dela e benebene ge duuli goe gadoo be di hadu maaloo dangihi. Gei goe guu dogi nia laagau i lodo au hadagee dabu belee daumaha iei goe gi nia god tuadimee.
Ma e aha ma ga matilitili gaa hai ono akai i di luada hua dela ne dogi nia maa kooe, gei nia maa hagalee huwa. Nia haingadaa hua, mono hagammaemmae deemee di hagahili.
Nnenua maaloo gu ngalungalua ngoloolo be di moana, gadoo be nia beau llauehe maaloo ma ga bagubaguu.

Nia henua llauehe e lloomoi be nia beau maaloo, gei God gaa dugu digaula, digaula gaa hula gi muli gaa llele gadoo be nia gelegele gohu dogolia i taalinga di gonduu, gadoo be di manga laagau e hahaangi i di madangi.
I nia hiahi, digaula e hagamadagudagu dangada, i nia luada gu hagalee. Deenei di mee gaa tale gi digau huogodoo ala e gaiaa tadau henua.
